>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/branches"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Cada branch representa una unidad de negocio dentro de tu empresa. Puede ser una sucursal, un área de negocio, etc.


<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Branches encontradas","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"company_branches":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","x-tags":["Branches"],"description":"Las branches representan divisiones o unidades de negocio específicas dentro de tu compañía.\n","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identificador único de la sucursal.","example":"branch_1B2M2Y8AsgTpgAmY7PhCfg"},"tin":{"type":"string","description":"Número de identificación tributaria de la sucursal.","example":"12.345.678-9"},"legal_company_name":{"type":"string","description":"Nombre legal de la sucursal.","example":"Sucursal de la empresa"}},"title":"Branch"}}},"title":"BranchList"}}}},"401":{"description":"Error de autenticación","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["type","title","status","detail"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"authentication_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Unauthorized"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":401},"detail":{"type":"string","example":"We could not authenticate your credentials. >
  
</StatusCodes>
